data.name: VerificationPageConfirmation
data.value: We have now sent you a confirmation email with your verification code.

data.name: ErrorMessageIncorrectCredentials
data.value: Your credentials were incorrect. Please try again.

data.name: ErrorMessageApiError
data.value: An error occurred making the request. Please try again.

data.name: ErrorMessageGeneric
data.value: An error occurred making the request.

data.name: RegistrationErrorMessageUsernameEmpty
data.value: Username cannot be empty or only contain whitespace.

data.name: RegistrationErrorMessageUsernameLength
data.value: Username must be between 1 and 255 characters.

data.name: RegistrationErrorMessageUsernameInvalidCharacters
data.value: The username can only contain letters, numbers, under-scores and hyphens.

data.name: RegistrationErrorMessageEmailAddressEmpty
data.value: Email address cannot be empty or only contain whitespace.

data.name: RegistrationErrorMessagePasswordEmpty
data.value: Password cannot be empty or only contain whitespace.

data.name: RegistrationErrorMessagePasswordMinimumLength
data.value: Password must be at least 8 characters.

data.name: RegistrationErrorMessagePasswordUppercaseCharacter
data.value: Password must contain at least one uppercase character.

data.name: RegistrationErrorMessagePasswordLowercaseCharacter
data.value: Password must contain at least one lowercase character.

data.name: RegistrationErrorMessagePasswordNumber
data.value: Password must contain at least one number.

data.name: RegistrationErrorMessagePasswordWhitespace
data.value: Password should not contain any spaces.

data.name: RegistrationErrorMessageConfirmPasswordEmpty
data.value: Confirm password cannot be empty or only contain whitespace.

data.name: VerificationErrorMessageVerificationCodeEmpty
data.value: The verification code cannot be empty or only contain whitespace.

data.name: VerificationErrorMessageVerificationCodeWhitespace
data.value: The verification code cannot contain any spaces.

data.name: VerificationErrorMessageVerificationCodeLength
data.value: Incorrect number of characters. The verification code will be between 1 and 5 characters.

data.name: VerificationErrorMessageVerificationCodeInvalidCharacters
data.value: The verification code should only contain letters and numbers.

data.value: You currently have no games in

data.value: Failed to load your games due to an error on the server.

data.value: Failed to load your games due to an unexpected error.

data.name: GamePageErrorMessage
data.value: Failed to load the selected game.

data.name: GameBarcodeScannerPageInstructions
data.value: Place the red line over the barcode you'd like to scan.

data.name: GameBarcodeScannerPageMakeARequest
data.value: Can't find the scanned barcode in our library. Would you like to make a request?

data.name: GameBarcodeScannerPageApiError
data.value: An error occurred scanning the barcode. Please try again.

data.name: GameBarcodeScannerPageGenericError
data.value: An error occurred scanning the barcode.

data.name: ForgottenPasswordPageInstructions
data.value: Please enter the email address associated with your account.

data.name: ForgottenPasswordErrorMessageEmailAddressEmpty
data.value: The email address cannot be empty or only contain whitespace.

data.name: ForgottenPasswordErrorMessageEmailAddressWhitespace
data.value: The email address cannot contain any spaces.

data.name: RecoveryPageInstructions
data.value: An email has been sent to your email containing your recovery token. Please enter it in the input below along with your username and new password.

data.name: RecoveryErrorMessageUsernameEmpty
data.value: Username cannot be empty or only contain whitespace.

data.name: RecoveryErrorMessageUsernameLength
data.value: Username must be between 1 and 255 characters.

data.name: RecoveryErrorMessageUsernameInvalidCharacters
data.value: The username can only contain letters, numbers, under-scores and hyphens.

data.name: RecoveryErrorMessageRecoveryTokenEmpty
data.value: Recovery token cannot be empty or only contain whitespace.

data.name: RecoveryErrorMessageRecoveryTokenWhitespace
data.value: Recovery token cannot contain any spaces.

data.name: RecoveryErrorMessageRecoveryTokenLength
data.value: Recovery token must be exactly 30 characters long.

data.name: RecoveryErrorMessageRecoveryTokenAlphanumeric
data.value: Recovery token should only contain alphanumeric characters.

data.name: RecoveryErrorMessagePasswordEmpty
data.value: Password cannot be empty or only contain whitespace.

data.name: RecoveryErrorMessagePasswordMinimumLength
data.value: Password must be at least 8 characters.

data.name: RecoveryErrorMessagePasswordUppercaseCharacter
data.value: Password must contain at least one uppercase character.

data.name: RecoveryErrorMessagePasswordLowercaseCharacter
data.value: Password must contain at least one lowercase character.

data.value: Password must contain at least one number.

data.name: RecoveryErrorMessagePasswordWhitespace
data.value: Password should not contain any spaces.
